title: Inflation Data Tops Estimates, Markets React (Correct)
itunes:title: Inflation Data Tops Estimates, Markets React (Correct)
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Chief US Interest Rate Strategist Ira Jersey joins the show to parse through higher than expected inflation data. Shawn Cruz, Senior Manager, Trader Services and Client Advocacy at TD Ameritrade joins to talk about the TD IMX findings markets, investing and economy. Bloomberg Law's Rebecca Rainey joins with an update on the potential US rail workers strike. Brent Donnelly, president at Spectra Markets joins to discuss currency and the Fed. Ellis Phifer, Managing Director of Fixed Income Capital Markets at Raymond James joins to give his outlook for the economy. Simona Mocuta, Chief Economist at State Street Global Advisors joins to discuss the CPI numbers, and what it means for the Fed. Hosts are Paul Sweeney and Kriti Gupta, in for Matt Miller. 

*Edited to include accidentally omitted segment.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
